meanings.definition: To identify or determine the nature of a medical condition or problem.
meanings.sent1: The doctor will diagnose your illness by asking you questions and examining you.
meanings.sent2: The specialist will diagnose the disease based on the test results.
meanings.sent3: I tried to diagnose my computer's issue by talking to it, but it didn't respond.
meanings.sent4: Her keen observation skills allowed her to diagnose the problem in the project quickly.
meanings.sent5: The detective was able to diagnose the crime scene with precision.

meanings.definition: To analyze or identify the cause or nature of a problem or situation.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic will diagnose the car's strange noise to find the source of the problem.
meanings.sent2: The IT specialist needs to diagnose the network issue to restore connectivity.
meanings.sent3: I tried to diagnose why my plant was wilting by giving it a pep talk.
meanings.sent4: The teacher could diagnose the root of the student's confusion and provide guidance.
meanings.sent5: The scientist was able to diagnose the experiment's failure through careful examination.
